item.title: Do you want to be on the #OpenStreetMap Foundation Board? There are 3 seats open, and you have until 21st Oct to nominate yourself! more info: <https://lists.openstreetmap.org/pipermail/osmf-talk/2023-October/008759.html> nominate yourself here: <https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Foundation/AGM2023/Election_to_Board#Submission_of_self-nominations> #OSM #OSMF #gischat

3 days left! üì¢ Call for Maps: State of the Map Europe 2023 üó∫ What's it going to be? Map of your country or city? Bike trails? Mini libraries? Wind turbines? Submit your¬†#OSM-based map by Oct. 18th to be displayed in Antwerp on Nov. 10-12! üòé üåê https://stateofthemap.eu/call-for-maps #OpenStreetMap #gischat #maps #map #SotMEU2023 #SotM #SotMEU

üåç Preparing for #SotMAfrica2023 in Cameroon? If you require a visa for Cameroonüá®üá≤, easily apply for an e-visa here: https://evisacam.cm/ords/dl_portal/r/public_portal/home ‚úàÔ∏è Safe travels! see more: <https://twitter.com/sotmafrica/status/1709848703484203063>

Do you like maps? Why am I asking, of course you do! Have you made your own map? Yay! Would you like to show it off at @sotmeu, the annual european #OpenStreetMap conference? You're in luck! Read more here: <https://stateofthemap.eu/call-for-maps> #OpenStreetMap #OSM #SotM #SotMEU #maps #gischat

In the #OpenStreetMap data model, linear features are (mostly) represented by the `way` data type, which can have at most 2,000 `node`s. Can you find a way for OpenStreetMap to have more than 2,000 donations by going https://supporting.openstreetmap.org/donate/ ü•∫ü•∫ #OSM
The #OpenStreetMap Donation drive is almost at 2,000 donations! üòç Can you find a way to make it over 2,000?ü•∫ü•∫ https://supporting.openstreetmap.org/donate/
What #OpenStreetMap map style do you like? üó∫ü§î reply with nice examples of #OSM maps! üòä

There's a new map style on OpenStreetMap.org! The Tracestrack Topo map from @tracestrack. It's a mix of osm-carto and OpenTopoMap. It has many improvements: more tag support (busway, embankment, cuisine, solar plants, aquaculture, pitch, sea, tree etc.), CJK fonts, etc. There is also better internationalisation: country specific road shields, peaks using imperial system in the US, hierarchical place rendering in China, etc. #OpenStreetMap #OSM #gischat #maps A screenshot of OSM.org showing the map layer sector open and showing tracesstrack Topo map selected and that as a map shown
If you want to feel good about the #OpenStreetMap mapping world, go to https://Supporting.OpenStreetMap.org/donate and read the comments left by the people who have made a gift to #OSM.

Did you know that on 1st Aug 2023, which was a typical day for #OpenStreetMap, there were 2.8 BILLION requests served at a rate of about 32 thousand a second? You would if you read @pnormanss diary post! Thankfully, the OSM tile service is underwritten by https://www.fastly.com/ Read more... <https://www.openstreetmap.org/user/pnorman/diary/402291> #OSM #DataPorn
@Firefishy Mappers in the USA should now see their map changes more quickly.

#OSM's senior SRE, @Firefishy, tells us that the new server was required because we were running out of capacity in the US. It will be used for renderings/updating the default map style used on https://osm.org. Here are the hardware specs: <https://hardware.openstreetmap.org/servers/piasa.openstreetmap.org/>
The new #OpenStreetMap server's name is Piasa, because the OSMF names its servers for dragons, because ‚Äúthere be dragons‚Äù. <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Piasa> Piasa cost the OSMF ‚Ç¨3,846.

Good news for US mappers! We've added a new tile render server in the US. Big thanks to OregonState OpenSource Lab (OSUOSL) @osuosl for hosting it (and other OSM servers since 2011!) Thank you, also, AWS Cloud for the credits.

PSA: you don't have to be in the Communications Working Group to suggest/write a story for the OSM blog or social media. Email your idea or draft to the CWG communication@osmfoundation.org or drop a comment below! We want to tell many more stories from across the #OSM community. #OpenStreetMap

PSA for all mappers and map users: SotM Nigeria is coming up on October 11 - 14 and they still need sponsors. This page has all the details . . . PSA for all mappers and map users: @sotmnigeria is coming up on October 11 - 14 and they still need sponsors. This page has all the details . . . https://2023.stateofthemapnigeria.org/call-for-sponsors/ ...and this video from Unique Mappers Network will inspire you https://m.youtube.com/watch?feature=shared&v=QmYfMfqNJ9M
In just one month, 1426 people donated ‚Ç¨ 50,450 (and change) The average gift was ‚Ç¨ 35.

We saw a big jump in mappers becoming members of the #OSM Foundation, too: 38 new members in July 365 in August! Want to join the movement? Here's how: https://supporting.openstreetmap.org/#Membership-Categories
We need a new two-month giving goal for September 9 - November 9. What should it be? https://supporting.openstreetmap.org ‚Ç¨25,000 ‚Ç¨50,000 ‚Ç¨100,000 other

It's not map data, but we know how data-minded you all, so have a look at these two graphs and tell us what you see: Graph of number of contributions to OSMF fundraising Graph of cumulative number of contributions to OSMF fundraising
